results.title: Simvastatin prevents load-induced protein tyrosine nitration in overloaded hearts.
results.text_hl: Another group of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ received treatment with either @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or placebo for 15 days after the onset of @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@pressure overload@@@, and their hearts were also studied.

citations.NLM: Nadruz W Jr, Lagosta VJ, Moreno H Jr, Coelho OR, Franchini KG. Simvastatin prevents load-induced protein tyrosine nitration in overloaded hearts. Hypertension. 2004 May;43(5):1060-6. PMID: 15023931

results.title: Hydroxymethylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin prevents cardiac hypertrophy induced by pressure overload and inhibits p21ras activation.
results.text_hl: Hydroxymethylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ prevents @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ induced by @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@pressure overload@@@ and inhibits @GENE_HRAS @GENE_293621 @@@p21ras@@@ activation.

results.title: Simvastatin prevents cardiac hypertrophy in vitro and in vivo via JAK/STAT pathway.
results.text_hl: We also showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ attenuated @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@pressure overload@@@ due to @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@abdominal aortic constriction@@@ by measuring such parameters as systolic blood pressure, ratio of heart weight to body weight and ratio of left ventricular weight to body weight in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ as well as cross-sectional area of cardiomyocytes.

citations.NLM: Liu J, Shen Q, Wu Y. Simvastatin prevents cardiac hypertrophy in vitro and in vivo via JAK/STAT pathway. Life Sci. 2008 May 7;82(19-20):991-6. PMID: 18400235
